def generate_diwali_pattern(T, N_list):
    results = []
    for n in N_list:
        a = [1]
        b = [2]
        c = [4]
        d = [3]
        j = 2
        for i in range(n - 1):
            a.append(a[i] + 3 * j)
            b.append(b[i] + 3 * j)
            c.append(c[i] + 6 * j)
            d.append(d[i] + 3 * j)
            j *= 2
        results.append([a, b, c, d])
    return results
